text.44_Daf, 33_Line: [fetuses shaped like certain animals still count as human births if] “their eyes go in front of them like those of a human”
text.60_Daf, 26_Line: father seeds the white from which [comes] bones . . .
text.60_Daf, 28_Line: and the Holy One puts in him spirit and n’shamah . . . ”
text.60_Daf, 27_Line: his mother seeds redness from which [comes] skin and flesh . . .
